website_summaries.verdict: This bread slicer is packed with features and made with bamboo that appeals to eco-conscious shoppers.
pros: Foldable design makes storing it a breeze
Includes a knife rest, butter spreader, and storage bag
cons: A little tricky to put together
Some slicers came with components that didn't line up properly

customer_reviews.title: I won't need it often, but it's perfect for when I will
customer_reviews.text: I don't have unsliced bread often, but I'm hoping to make more bread so I needed a slicing guide. I love that it's got a crumb catcher because that's easily the worst part of slicing bread. It's easy to put together and it's really adjustable... like I used it to slice dinner rolls because I wanted to try it out. You can change it to suit the width of your loaf in a snap! It's definitely a nice kitchen tool and the packaging is really nice... it'd make a great housewarming gift.
customer_reviews.author: Miriam's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: The right width for bread machine loaves.
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect bread slicer for me. I needed one that was just the right width for the loaves my bread machine turns out. The space between the slotted sides is 5.5 inches. Easy to assemble. Bamboo has a lovely aroma.
customer_reviews.author: D. Dycus

customer_reviews.title: This Slicer Needs to be REDESIGNED!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I like about this Bread Slicer is that is made with Bamboo. It is difficult to assemble, does not allow knife to slice through completely to the bottom of the bread. For me it does not do the job, I would not ever consider buying this slicer Do not buy this slicer! I am using it now trying to adjust the slice size, I can not get the separator apart. I wish i could return this!! I received this Oct 2019, I want to return this slicer!!!
customer_reviews.author: Foto

customer_reviews.title: Parts do not align.  Cannot be assembled.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two of these hoping to get one that could be assembled and used. Back plate on both was so misaligned that cutting board could not be assembled and used. Too bad. Good concept. Excellent packaging. But unusable because of poor quality control in manufacturing process. Returned both for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Banks

customer_reviews.title: Useful beauty
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this bread board! Arrived early. Beautifully packaged. Easy to assemble and use. Looks great on countertop and when serving freshly sliced bread or cakes. Makes multiple sized slices of bread. Also contains all crumbs when slicing, so cleanup is a breeze. Very durable. Affordable. Easy to clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: WordSpinner

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!. Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I like the design. I used to slice my loaf in the plastic plate using a bread knife and it so messy. This makes my bread slicing easy and equal. This is a great deal for its price since it also comes with a recipe book.
customer_reviews.author: Danica

customer_reviews.title: Bread slicer and Bamboo work of art.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was exactly as promised. Packaging was worthy of expensive piece of jewelry. Bread slicer appears to be the work of skilled craftsmen. We expect it will work as good as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: NEALAR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and useful slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. Shipping was really fast. First of all, the packaging: carefully and beautifully packaged. The packaging truly protects the product. It's very high quality. The slicer: It's easy to assemble and dissemble. Made of solid and durable bamboo material that has a delicious aroma. It looks very nice on the countertop, all my friends loved it. You can choose the slice width from very thin to a think slice, so it's very convenient. It comes with a cute bamboo butter spreader that turned out to be my husband's favorite part. The crumb catcher is just perfect, cleanup is very easy and comes with a pretty bag to store it. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Sides don’t line up with back, making it not fit together.
customer_reviews.text: The back board that is supposed to slide into place can’t because it isn’t lined up with the guides. I bought this one because it adjusts to the width of the bread. But the one I got can only do small bread loafs because when you try attach the back to the sides wile it’s in the crumb tray it doesn’t line up and it doesn’t fit together. So pointless I should have gotten a cheep one. I’ll have to return it or file down the slot so it will work. It would still work for loaves smaller than 4 1/2 inches wide. It will not work for anything larger what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brewster

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Like many others during this pandemic, I've gotten back to baking bread. I thought this would be a helpful tool in keeping bread slices even and it is. (My husband cuts it at an angle and that really messes up a loaf.) The only problem I had was that one of the "slats" arrived with a split in it. I didn't register a complaint or send it back but rather dug out my trusty super-glue. That worked and seems to have taken care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Maine Jo

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: I appreciate the thought and work that went into this slicer but after usage I am afraid that I cannot recommend it. The basic concept is sound however the material used - bamboo - in my opinion is the not the right choice. After slicing 2 loaves of bread the bamboo sustained significant damage and will certainly not last for many more cuttings. I worked diligently to center my thin bread cutting knife between the slates and could not. The sides of the slates had splinters from the knife cut. Maybe some type of very hard metal but then I wouldn't want metal shaving either. I'm back to uneven slices made by hand.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I received a unit where one of the pieces didn't fit well. I contacted the vendor and James promptly shipped me a replacement. (Thank you again!) Other than the misfitting piece, the bamboo is sturdy and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Update: damn thing broke the 2nd time i used it. Side guide broke in half. Now no stars. I chose to pay a bit more for this one because of the bamboo butter knife that was included, and mine didn't have one. So three stars for the lie.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product!!! I recently started baking fresh bread and bagels but it was difficult to get nice even slices consistently. Then I got this product! It makes it super easy to evenly slice bread evenly and quickly. It is easy to put together and clean after use. I love how flat and compact it is when taken apart. My husband is also really impressed by it. I love making fresh baked bread but dreaded slicing it. This product makes it so easy, in baking bread and bagels all the time now!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: It came damaged, the pieces do not fit in place either.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda M.

customer_reviews.title: Pass and buy a usable one.
customer_reviews.text: It's garbage. Splinters, horribly warped pieces. Find an old Presto bread slicing guide. Works perfect whether cutting with manual or electric knives. Plastic holds up to electric knives. Wood doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: brok

customer_reviews.title: Don't care for design
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd be able to put the whole loaf in and slice it up, but no. It has different width selection sections and none of the width sections are long enough for a whole bread maker loaf. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Swany

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. Folds flat and stores it's pieces inside. Fairly easy to clean. With the slats fitting in it, it's not very sturdy. The size guide only gives 4 slices of thin bread, the rest is graduated larger in size. Not bad but no wow factor here
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bread slicer.
customer_reviews.text: You can have the option to choose the thickness you want your bread. It looks durable and since this is made of bamboo so I'm assuming this would last longer than our previous. Avoid washing or soaking it in the water after using them, instead, simply wipe it with a clean cloth. Wash them once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Plumber

customer_reviews.title: Best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: If you bake bread at home, you need it. Like now. The most difficult aspect of baking bread is in fact not baking but slicing it evenly without having a flood of breadcrumbs around you. This bread slicer apparatus takes care of the crumbs and the grooves help guide in getting even slices. Probably the best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.author: Rishab Narula

customer_reviews.title: Quality Control might be an issue.
customer_reviews.text: Conceptually this is a great design. Unfortunately had to send mine back as the backing board was slightly too large and could not complete assembly. Probably just a quality control issue but one that prevented my keeping the product.
customer_reviews.author: James A. Caponigro

customer_reviews.title: Nice product, great packaging
customer_reviews.text: Handy little board! I don't know if my bread knife is too aggressive for it, time will tell, but I'll be sure to keep it oiled and happy. Easy to put together, easy to store, easy to clean. Nice little packaging, attentive seller. It seems overall, there aren't any reasonably priced bread slicers on the market that are appropriate for a larger sourdough boule, but this one worked well when I cut it in half. Thanks also for the free e-book, tote and little butter knife!
customer_reviews.author: Nat Cap

customer_reviews.title: Happy baker!  like option to slice my bread
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for slicing homemade bread and easy to store for next use
customer_reviews.author: sweetpzz

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It arrived super fast. Assembly was easy and also fast. It looks solid & no broken pieces. I’ll bake a keto loaf tomorrow morning and try it out. Keto bread is solid and hard to slice.
customer_reviews.author: Luella Bramley

customer_reviews.title: Great for home bread makers
customer_reviews.text: Product worked exactly as it says! Makes even slicing of homemade bread a breeze! Super easy to put together and stores compactly. If you make a lot of homemade bread this is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Jordan-Flight

customer_reviews.title: The best bread slicer ever.
customer_reviews.text: It folds flat for space saving storage and has it’s own storage bag. I bought a plastic bread slicer and it was a waste of money. So happy to have this one now.
customer_reviews.author: Julia G Lange

customer_reviews.title: Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: This thing is terrible and was falling apart from the day I bought it. I tried fixing it with wood glue/ nails and staples. The wood doesn’t stay in place. Cheap crap!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse M. Fulton

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to Slice Bread
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is so convenient! It’s foldable which not only makes it easy to store but it also makes it super easy to clean. I made a Fruity Pebble banana bread and this made it so easy to cut the banana bread. It’s perfect for displaying your cut bread for events as well as it will be sure to impress your guest.
customer_reviews.author: Shirlz

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bread slicer ,love it cuts bread to fit toaster.My other one sliced bread to big for toaster so i never use that one anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for slicing bread
customer_reviews.text: Great product, helped me to cut my homemade bread until I could learn how to slice the bread well enough to do it on my own. It was kinda like using it as "training wheels" to learn how to slice bread like a pro.
customer_reviews.author: leslie henderson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I found it be one of the flimsiest, cheaply made, products I have ever purchased. Couldn’t wait to return it and get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: David Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great product that ships quickly!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who makes fresh bread every week and a lot of food from scratch this was a perfect product for me! It’s sturdy and good quality, easy to clean, easy to use, and I love how it makes each of my slices of bread uniformed! It also shipped really quick... I shared it on my Instagram account @ourfarmhouseliving on how to use it to show how easy it is! Thanks for this wonderful product 😊
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Haglund

customer_reviews.title: Premium Bamboo Foldable Bread Slicer
customer_reviews.text: The set up is non intuitive and the instructions are not clear. The bamboo material s great.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I was making home made bread and it helped me cut the slices straight
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Should’ve had a holding board that pushes against the bread to hold it in place while you slice the bread.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not held together well. Broke while using for the first time. Works ok if you just need a rustic slice. Good luck getting even slices they differ even if you remove each slice and cut again.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: So easy to keep the bread at even slices. You have a choice for thicknesses. Loves it
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Wood bread slicer.
customer_reviews.text: Side fell off when I opened pkg. Very tiny nails which came loose. I will try to glue with wood glue. I have had one several months and mine developed a crack which I repaired. Otherwise it is great. So disappointed since this was a gift for someone.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Harrington

customer_reviews.title: Nice board!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice board! Easy to assemble and clean. Stores neatly in it's provided bag. Not dishwasher safe because it is bamboo, but easy to just wipe down for next use. There are 3 slice thicknesses to choose from and you can adjust the cutter for the thickness of your bread. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia G. Overman

customer_reviews.title: Not a keeper.Bamboo is good material but slot alignments do not fit correctly.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product because it's made of bamboo. The design concept and different choices of width looks good. However, when I try to assemble it the cut out slots for the end and two side end rails do not perfectly aligned to the bottom tray. It does not allow you to slice the bread all the way to the bottom end of the bread. Not a keeper! will return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sanny S. Eusebio

customer_reviews.title: Quarantine life calls for enjoying the simple life with handy at home devices!
customer_reviews.text: Covid-times mean lots of carb baking and consumption! This device perfectly slices your bread (either thin or thick, depending on your preference)!
customer_reviews.author: Tanya Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slice
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift - totally makes homemade bread slice PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works nice and neat
customer_reviews.text: I'm a terrible bread slicer that is exactly why I've purchased this. It works nice and neat. My breads are now evenly cut.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Just what I needed, beautifully made, easy to assemble, knife holder is a must, and adjustable! Love the butter spreader!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is very attractive and seems well made. I do take issue with the back that attaches two the slicing guides. It doesn't try as I may. I can use it if I place it a slice or two from the back.
customer_reviews.author: CAC

customer_reviews.title: Great Slicer
customer_reviews.text: This bread slicer is very versatility and very handy. It is easy to to set up and use. The cleaning process is not hard at all. The product comes beautiful packaged and is easy to store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kseniya S.

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a wooden butter knife :)
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great piece for the buck. It reminds me of something I would get in Sweden (I’m born and raised there). I really liked the wooden butter knife. That’s something I grew up with!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Holstein

customer_reviews.title: Even slices!
customer_reviews.text: We like a nice even slices and this does the trick!! Sits on the counter all the time!
customer_reviews.author: #OrderOnline

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget, a little wobbly though
customer_reviews.text: Good for slicing homemade bread. The width is adjustable to accommodate different sized loaves. It is a little wobbly, gripping the top of the sidewalls makes it sturdier during slicing.
customer_reviews.author: Baerbel S.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Like everybody else quarantined at home, I bought a bread machine. This bread slicer makes it much easier to have even slices
customer_reviews.author: Pamela S. Tyson

customer_reviews.title: Just a great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Versatile enough that you can control the thickness of your bread slices. Looks durable, easy to clean and all in all just a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Cutting makes it easy and no mess
customer_reviews.text: This bamboo bread slicer is both useful and beautiful. I find myself enjoying every slice that I make. For that, a big 5-stars!
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Looks like it will be user friendly...
customer_reviews.text: Was this supposed to have a bread cutting knife included? If yes, there is no knife, just the bamboo butter spreader....I have not used this device yet
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t work
customer_reviews.text: Read the entire print. This plucker is for SMALL BIRDS.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for homemade bread
customer_reviews.text: I like the different size slicing guides and the crumb catcher Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: K. D.

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Thought a slicer / knife came with it, none included. But it's still a nice slicing guide.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Great little item!
customer_reviews.text: easy to clean very sturdy easy set up love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this bread slicer
customer_reviews.text: Not at all stable while slicing, which can make uneven bread slices.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: doesn't fit together well.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold together well either, if anything it made the bread harder to slice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My advice: by a small electric meat slicer with a serrated blade.
customer_reviews.text: This product works as advertised. The downside is you are limited to the 3 thickness settings. I now use an electric food slicer with a serrated blade and I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Hermit

customer_reviews.title: Works like it's supposed to!
customer_reviews.text: We slice the bread in the 2 smallest sizes usually but all 3 sizes are nice. We have a lot of food allergies with our 4 kids. So I usually make our bread. This makes the slicing process less brutal on the bread 😂. It did have that typical bamboo smell but not quite as strong as some. Either way though - a couple of washes always gets rid of it. And it all fits inside the crumb tray and down in the bag. Kinda nice for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Nina Ann

customer_reviews.title: Really wanted to like it
customer_reviews.text: First off, this thing is beautiful to look at - looks great on the counter. Fits any loaf of bread, stores flat and is reasonably compact. The issue I had was putting it together - the bread bracket, for lack of a better term, is two side pieces (where the cutting guides are) and a backing piece that is supposed to hold the sides together. Doesn't fit together very well and I snapped off a whole section of one side panel without trying too hard. Was not cheap so this is a disappointing design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: G. Webb

customer_reviews.title: many options for slice width
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to work with. I didn’t realize how versatile it was when I ordered it but noticed after receiving at that you can make several different adjustments to adjust how thick you want your bread sliced. I make a poll on style low and it fits perfectly on this slicer. Folds down for convenience
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it isn’t very sturdy. Lotta work to cut bread.
customer_reviews.text: It’s petty cumbersome. I’d say it’s considerable more work than just cutting bread on a cutting board. I thought the guides would be more sturdy. They aren’t at all. The whole thing rattles around and it’s hard to keep everything from flopping about. Also, you need a really long knife to get any sawing action with the guides set in the widest position. I wouldn’t buy it again. I think the money is better spent on a decent sharp knife.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: No Quality Control; buy elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Product was nicely boxed but arrived w/o instructions. Attempting to put it together, I discovered that the base (crumb catcher) was out of square. Then, the end piece, apparently cut too thick, would not fit into any of the side slots. In short, had the product been tested (or even looked at) prior to shipment, it would never have been sold as a bread slicer. The only useable product I received was an out-of-square crumb catcher (and complementary butter knife).
customer_reviews.author: Goldilocks

customer_reviews.title: OUTSTANDING seller!  UNBEATABLE customer service!  SUBERB craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: James, the seller (of 'Worldwide influence'), is literally UNBELIEVABLE!!! Never before in my life have I encountered a seller as kind, considerate, and generous as he! The unit I received was missing it's adhesive rubber feet. When I asked him to send me some, he not only ordered me a set of adhesive rubber feet (quantity of 96) from Amazon, but additionally created an order for a brand new bread slicer FREE of charge! Now how can you beat THAT for customer service?! The piece itself is quite sturdy and good quality. The craftsmanship is superb! I'm MOST pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy slicer!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this bread slicer! The whole slicer is made of bamboo and the quality is really nice and very sturdy! It’s wide enough to fit a whole loaf of toast or bread. The non-slip rubbery feet on the bottom is a big help when slicing bread. Overall it’s a great slicer that is affordable!
customer_reviews.author: WATwinsMom

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This slicer is very user-friendly. I love how it collects (most of) the crumbs. It is easy to assemble and disassemble. It folds up and stores itself nicely into the base. The included storage bag is very convenient. My only complaint is the knife slot. It would have been more functional had it been cut into the base along its long side rather than the short side. I'm sure if you have deep enough counters it is not an issue but I do not so the knife holder is useless.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Bread Bakers know they need this!
customer_reviews.text: I'm hoping this nifty gadget will end the war in my house over who butchers the loaf... So far I'm impressed with the quality and packaging. Slicing bread is easy as long as you have the guides lined up properly. They seem to have thought of everything; operation, storage and extras. I'm happy with my purchase, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki  B

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use and Storage
customer_reviews.text: When I bought my bread machine I ordered this at the same time, so smart! I love this product. It's easy to assemble and take apart, I especially like the fact that I can cut my loaves into different slice widths. Perfect for sandwich, toaster and french toast sizes. Easily stores in it's own bag. Very worthwhile addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: ROCreads

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful slicer!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent slicer! No rough edges and it assembled easily once I understood the correct way. The multiple thickness is wonderful and the storage bag unexpectedly awesome! Now my homemade bread is evenly sliced to each person's preference and the slicer put away neatly in its bag for next time!
customer_reviews.author: Mik Keith

customer_reviews.title: Not the best design
customer_reviews.text: The small board at the back does not fit properly so I have to hold the side boards together at the top to keep them stable. That makes it more difficult to use.
customer_reviews.author: NGTZ

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable width
customer_reviews.text: Crumbcatcher really does catch crumbs. Easy to change width of loaf to hold it ready to slice. Easy to change slice thickness. I didn't see any other bamboo with these options. Forget plastic ones because it's a waste of money. Save up and get this one.
customer_reviews.author: E. Brent Price

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful addition to kitchen tools
customer_reviews.text: Well made, boxed nicely enough to gift it to a bread baker. It's a little confusing to put together, but that might just be me. The first one I received was defective, and the seller graciously replaced it with one in perfect condition. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sanibeljac

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bread slicer we have had!! Its sturdy and solid!! So happy we bought this. We always make our own bread and this helps keep all the slices the size we want!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent but could be better
customer_reviews.text: Great use as a guide to slice the bread. But has trouble holding the bread in place, cutting slots are too wide, resulting up in uneven slice widths, material easily scratches from knife marks.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The best ever
customer_reviews.text: Best bread slicer. I need a longer bread knife. Which will work out for you in the long run. Make sure you oil it with the right oil. Will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Swiftbird

customer_reviews.title: Overall not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is a nice tool. I find that if you are not very straight then you can catch the wooden when slicing. But in general, good value.
customer_reviews.author: Amy K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect bread slicer... you can vary the bread loaf width, and size of cut, has a crumb catch basin at the bottom and has a place to put the bread knife at the end of the slicer. Nice addition to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: USA Resident

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen gadget!
customer_reviews.text: Great kitchen gadget for someone who make bread regularly. Good quality. I love that it's also a cooling rack. Bread sliced beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: mommythesedays

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart, slicing is difficult, bamboo is too soft for knife
customer_reviews.text: The sides fall off when cutting. The bread is difficult to cut and the bamboo damages easily. Too expensive but I'd pay it if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: The slicer will not stay together when assembled. You have to have at least 1 more hand to keep everything together to get it to work. Also, wood has a strong, chemically smell. No stars!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes bread slicing very easy.
customer_reviews.text: I had a little trouble putting this together. Read hide book again, and I understood how to use the end guide. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: No knife included as stated
customer_reviews.text: My only beef is with Amazon not the slicer. The description states it comes with a knife and it does not.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Sieb

customer_reviews.title: Easy sliced bread
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and use. Good quality. Easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very good quality. Only disappointment was the photos show a bread knife, but of course this was not included. Everythink else looks good, but haven’t tried it out yet.
customer_reviews.author: Roy S

customer_reviews.title: Bread board and cutting guide with crumb tray
customer_reviews.text: Bread board and cutting guide with crumb tray, all in one!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pugh

customer_reviews.title: Different size slots from very thin to Texas Toast size
customer_reviews.text: I keep this on the kitchen island as I use it all the time whether for homemade bread or a whole loaf I buy
customer_reviews.author: Debby

customer_reviews.title: What's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything they could do to make it better.
customer_reviews.author: mcsawyer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Well made and it looks good. It works perfectly for cutting my freshly baked loaf breads.
customer_reviews.author: Dari

customer_reviews.title: Best bread slicer I haver ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bread slicer. It is of the highest quality product. I would highly recommend this to all!
customer_reviews.author: Paksung

customer_reviews.title: Very useful. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: It is very easy to use. Good addition to our kitchen. This will make our breakfast more enjoyable. Fits mostly all types of freshly baked bread. The crumb catcher prevents the process from getting messy. It also makes everything easier to clean. The wood is hard and tough. Perfect slices of bread every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalinda

product_meta.title: Premium Bamboo Foldable Bread Slicer – Built in Crumb Catcher and Knife Rest |Bread Slicing Guide, Bread Loaf Slicer– BONUS Bamboo Butter Spreader, Storage Bag and Guide Book.
feature_bullets: ➤ DURABILITY: We have used the highest quality bamboo wood in manufacturing our bread slicer guide which is natural bamboo. Solid materials, smooth finish, compact design makes it perfect for everyday use.

➤ PERFECT SLICE: It’s the perfect slicer guide for your homemade bread. It won’t be a hard target to cut even slices. You will also have a choice to cut a slice of your desired thickness without risk of cutting your fingers.

➤ EASY STORAGE: Kitchen Naturals bamboo bread slicer comes with a knife rest and storage bag. You can easily make it ready for everyday use in seconds. When your finished cutting bread, you can easily clean and fold it flat to fit in your drawer.

➤ CRUMB CATCHER: We all are tired of cleaning crumbs after cutting bread every time from our table. We have equipped this bread loaf slicer with a built-in crumb catcher tray so you won’t have to worry about cleaning your table anymore.

➤ GUARANTEE: We back our product with a replacement & money back guarantee. If you are not happy with our product’s performance, you can claim a 100% refund on the purchase price or in case of any issue you can claim a replacement. *Bread Knife Not Included
